Class CompassHeading

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompassHeading

  • public class CompassHeading
extends java.lang.Object
    A CompassHeading class is designed to set initial degree, check it is range between [0 ,360), and get bearing within quadrant.

    Adilet Momunaliev
